entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono] custom debugger extenstion #62220
  • PublishReadyToRun fails on .NET6 / linux-musl-x64 / Docker #62219
  • HttpClient regression when updating tests to .NET 6 #62216
  • Improve FMA code generation related to operand last use #62215
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62212
    Future
  • bash: dotnet: command not found (.NET 6 installed on CentOS 7) #62208
  • Tests failing in system.net.security.tests.sslstreamtls13networkconformancetests #62205
  • Add better API to support communication with Kerberos endpoints #62202
    7.0.0
  • [android] arm64 running on x64 emulator unexpected FPSIMD_MAGIC assert #62201
    .NET 6.0-MAUI
  • System.IO.IOException “The parameter is incorrect” at System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister() #62192
    Future
  • Add an argument to SuperPMI #62188
    7.0.0
  • Console.Foreground does not correctly set the color in every Terminal #62186
  • [.Net 5] :: Unable to find package Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x64 with version (= 5.0.11)' when 5.0.11 runtime is present #62185
  • Different Heap behavior between 5.0 and 6.0. Maybe memory leak? #62182
    7.0.0
  • createdump fails on arm64: Can not find the _dyld_all_image_infos symbol #62181
  • Invalid field sequence in value numbering #62178
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\BenchmarksGame\\regex-redux\\regex-redux-5\\regex-redux-5.cmd #62174
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_AllClientVsIndividualServerSupportedProtocols_Success(serverProtocol: Tls13) #62171
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Tls13) #62168
  • Pipe.ReadAtLeastAsync return with less bytes than asked. #62167
  • Somebody please add support for BigInteger in Parallel.For #62176
  • Unclear documentation for FileSystemInfo.LinkTarget #62166

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make BigInteger implement IConvertible #62022
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/gcdump/gcdump/gcdump.sh #61824
    7.0.0
  • arm64 jitstress failing with `encoding_found` assert #61944
    7.0.0
  • Race condition writing Microsoft.Interop.DllImportGenerator.dll during library product build (Windows x64 Release) #61687
  • CI failure (net48 x86): GenerateResource.cache is being used by another process #62028
    7.0.0
  • Testing issue triage automation -- please disregard #62211
  • EventCounters pipeline on linux fires twice per cycle #61971
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow returning stack allocated memory, here's how #62189
  • Assertion failed '(constIndOffset % elemSize) == 0' #62179
  • HttpStress and SslStress builds are broken #60769
    7.0.0
  • Class Ping not reading response when ICMP Time-to-live exceeded #61465
    7.0.0
  • dump collection infra and python crypto dependency #62100
  • ConcurrentStack.PushRange(T[]) throws an ArgumentOutOfRangeException on empty T[] #62121
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer throws serializing new object() with JsonSerializerDefaults.Web #61995
    7.0.0
  • [mono][bug] mono_alc_from_gchandle return wrong value? #62052
  • TimeSpan is (de)serialized incorrectly using the JSON source generator #62082
    7.0.0
  • The value of the parameter cannot be changed when debugging the WASM project. #61974
    Future
  • A self-built crossgen2 hangs on some recent Linux distributions #61671
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester/tester.sh #62173
  • [Question] :What happens when binary shift is performed exceeding the width of data's size. #62172
  • [Mono][Perf][AOT] Regressions in BigInteger benchmarks. #61623

PullRequests

Created

  • [SuperPMI] Added a new optional -compile argument #62217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT/EE interface cleanups #62214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #62210
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/6.0] Port #58410: Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #62207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • re-enable and fix the SetOutReadToEnd test #62200
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Couple of debug info test fixes #62199
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Mark the gc poll function as used so llvm doesn't optimi… #62198
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62194
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Shrink version name due to NuGet maximum #62190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, packaging
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix trees generated for vtable calls #62177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix mono debugger thread block when wait for attach #62175
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve SuperPMI temp filename creation #62169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have RegexInterpreter work over ReadOnlySpan<char> instead of strings. #62165
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Fix a few syntax issues in shell scripts #62102
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use the right format of bkpt/brk for align that falls after jump #62106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove workarounds for referencing the DllImport source generator now that we use the RTM sdk. #62156
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • area-PAL-Libraries merged into area-System.Runtime.InteropServices #62180
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Update creating codespace instructions #62213
    area-Meta
  • Fix clang 13 induced runtime issues #62170
    area-Meta
  • Update DI external tests for Stashbox #61928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #61927
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Validate end when reading QPACK headers #62164
    area-System.Net.Http
  • avoid code duplication for disabling parallelization with xUnit #62132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Run Codespaces prebuild only in upstream repo #62162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Remove hack for nint/nfloat #62053
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, .NET 6.0-MAUI
  • Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62150
    area-System.Net.Http
  • No-op ConcurrentStack.PushRange(T[]) if empty #62126
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62020
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62130
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, 7.0.0
  • Fix mono alc from gchandle #62120
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement Runtime.evaluate. #62142
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid printing debug info on 0 byte instructions #62077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] A draft of doc for describing debugger behavior. #62015
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono (#61707)" #62157
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Remove extraneous support in the test runner generator for referencing corelib directly. #62154
  • Mono hot reload reorg and beginning (disabled) add method support #61853
    area-EnC-mono

Updated

  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Force new label after IG that ends with align instruction #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to Microsoft.Extensions libraries #61867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, no recent activity, community-contribution
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use char override Writer for System.Private.Xml #61722
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: don't resolve DT_LNK/DT_UNKNOWN unless it is needed. #62138
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #62124
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.2
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • don't run the System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfo tests in parallel #62134
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.0 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Use conditional statement instead of switch in System.Linq.Enumerable #61215
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use interpolated strings in place of `StringBuilder.AppendFormat` where possible. #62160
    community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix OpenStandardInput Stream sometimes throwing for Reads. #62153
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavange fix #62008
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Track a missing place to reset alignment flag from BasicBlock #62163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some missing debug info #62018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix use of StringBuilder.AppendFormat in ILCompiler #62147
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
